plot: After the killing of Thomas Wellington the entire wedding party are spooked and are questioned in detail by Sheriff Mills. J.D. and Abby find the mutilated body of Marty Dunn and leads to Abby showing J.D. & Henry's her father's murder board. Believing that John Wakefield didn't die 7 years previously and is responsible for the recent deaths Abby and Henry dig up the grave of John Wakefield but they find his skeleton in the casket. Another wedding guest meets a grizzly end. Meanwhile, Cal and Chloe go to great lengths to get back the engagement ring that Cal lost.—Anonymous

Sheriff Mills secures the scene as the wedding party reacts to a sudden death. Henry must leave Trish's side to confide in Abby his suspicions about JD, who later takes Abby to see a grizzly sight. An affair revealed in the Wellington clan leads to fighting. Abby shares the sheriff's morbid secret with Henry and JD, the latter of whom suggests that serial killer John Wakefield has returned to the island, but Abby thinks her dad has been tracking a copycat. Meanwhile, unaware of the tragedies, Cal learns where his engagement ring has resurfaced and Chloe devises a stratagem to recover it. When Wakefield's grave is dug up to prove his death, JD flees to a friend in the forest.—Anonymous

After Thomas Wellington's decapitation at the wedding rehearsal, Henry is shown Abbi's proof, including a corpses stash shown to her by J.D., that her father, the sheriff, must be working on the assumption that John Wakefield either lives or has a copycat, perhaps a former accomplice. J.D. is locked up after claiming he saw Wakefield, a digging up seems to disprove that. Trish's sister Shea wickedly divulges her husband Richard's affair with her mother, which daughter Madison meanly helps paint wrongly to incriminate her father to the sheriff. Calvin and Chloe come to terms with his 'lost' diamond engagement ring. Sully and his mates feel trapped as potential murder suspects.—KGF Vissers
